name: Amexio Tab
description: Tab component for Angular Apps with multiple configurations such as Tab, Icon support, Scrollable tabs, Closable tab, Vertical Tabs

properties.name: closable
properties.description: This flag will make tab closable, applicable for all tab pills.

properties.name: action
properties.description: This flag ensures the action Component

properties.name: tab-position
properties.description: Position of tab can be (top/bottom).  When Tab is used in card and tab-position is bottom , make sure footer property of card is false

events.name: onClick
events.description: Callback to invoke on activated tab event.

tabproperties.name: active
tabproperties.description: Set true for specific tab open as default tab..

tabproperties.name: icon
tabproperties.description: Supports glyphicon only. Can add directly home instead of 'glyphicon glyphicon-home.

tabproperties.name: amexio-color
tabproperties.description: Font color for the tab label

tabproperties.name: closable
tabproperties.description: This flag will make tab closable, applicable for particular tab pills.

methods.name: addDynamicTab(title: string, amexio-color: string, closable: boolean, DyanmicTabComponent)
closeAllTabs()
methods.description: Method to close all tabs altogether (only if the closable property is true).

methods.name: setActivetab(number: number)
methods.description: Method to set tab active on the basis of tab sequence.(If tab index matches with input, method sets that tab active and returns true, else returns false)

methods.name: setActiveTab(title: string)
methods.description: Method to set tab active on the basis of tab title. (If tab title matches with input, method sets that tab active and returns true, else returns false

methods.name: closeTabs(tabArray: array)
methods.description: Method to close all other tabs(only if closable flag is true) , except few required tabs (those tabs title have to be added in array)
